WorldLoaded = function() player = Player.GetPlayer("GoodGuy") enemy = Player.GetPlayer("BadGuy")
Trigger.OnObjectiveAdded(player, function(p, id) Media.DisplayMessage(p.GetObjectiveDescription(id), "New " .. string.lower(p.GetObjectiveType(id)) .. " objective") end) Trigger.OnObjectiveCompleted(player, function(p, id) Media.DisplayMessage(p.GetObjectiveDescription(id), "Objective completed") end) Trigger.OnObjectiveFailed(player, function(p, id) Media.DisplayMessage(p.GetObjectiveDescription(id), "Objective failed") end)
